Then they attacked Jerusalem <<and defeated Jehoiakim and his army>>.A man named Nebuchadnezzar was the king of Babylon. Another man named Jehoiakim was the king of Judah. When Daniel heard about the new law, he went to his house. And he went to the room that was on the top of his house. He knelt in front of a window so that he could look toward Jerusalem.
